title.narrative: IDPs working with Government as Cash for Work Program

description.narrative:
The projects aims to find jobs in the areas that contains a big number of Hawija new displaced areas, and find jobs for 200 IDP workers, the location that we are targeting are :
- Dibes government facilities, Dibes government facilities is so important because it is located on direct ways that Hawija new displaced IDPs will cross , the firs road will be directly from Hawija to Dibes front lines and the secont road will be for those Hawijan IDPs who will come to Kirkuk governorate crossing Dibes district, regarding to the government in Kirkuk and the local government in Dibes, they are suffering from human resources gap and 2 month cash for work in Dibes will be so useful in these government facilities and will fill a big gap in serving the IDPs and host communities in the area, the facilities will be choose to work in by cash for work project depending on an assessment with the government and the IDP families will be choose to work depending of vulnerability assessment conducting by TOCD team and the families that will be chose for cash for work program should meet with the vulnerability criteria. - Sayadah government facilities, Sayadah government facilities is so important also because a big population of Hawija IDPs living in this area, this area will be divided on three areas “Sayadah apartments, Sayadah Village and Sayadah area itself”, regarding to the government in Kirkuk, they are suffering from human resources gap and 2 month cash for work in Sayadah will be so useful in these government facilities and will fill a big gap in serving the IDPs and host communities in the area, the facilities will be choose to work in by cash for work project depending on an assessment with the government and the IDP families will be choose to work depending of vulnerability assessment conducting by TOCD team and the families that will be chose for cash for work program should meet with the vulnerability criteria, around 85% of Sayadah location population are from Hawija IDPs. - Panja Ali government facilities, Panja Ali government facilities is so important also because a big population of Mosul, Dyala, Anbar and Salahuddin IDPs living in this area,regarding to the government in Kirkuk, they are suffering from human resources gap and 2 month cash for work in Panja Ali will be so useful in these government facilities and will fill a big gap in serving the IDPs and host communities in the area, the facilities will be choose to work in by cash for work project depending on an assessment with the government and the IDP families will be choose to work depending of vulnerability assessment conducting by TOCD team and the families that will be chose for cash for work program should meet with the vulnerability criteria, around 45% of the population in this location are from the IDPs..
Regarding to an assessment we have conducted in coordination with the government in these 3 locations, health centers, community centers, schools…etc needs rehabilitations and the government suffers from a human resource gap in serving the communities in these 3 locations because regarding to the government the federal government did sent any budget since 2013.
The target population will be chose depending on an assessment in line with Do Not Harm guidance and principles.
